page.title: 05Radford Mill Farm.
page.content: { Radford Mill Farm}covers 73 acres.It is an organic farm.That is a very progressive yet traditional type of farming,in which chemicals and artificial fertilizers are not used.Instead manure is used on the land.In order to maintain a natural balance,many animals are kept. The animals include beef and dairy cattle,pigs,sheep,ducks,geese,hens, goats,guinea fowl,and a donkey.Trout are also kept in the farm mill ponds. The crops grown on the farm include field beans,swede,potatoes and grass. There are 3 acres of organically grown vegetables.Farm produce is sold to a health food shop in Bristol. The Farm has a long history.It was formerly a water mill.The machinery used is mainly for hay-making.There is a hay trailer,three tractors and a muck-spreader.
